fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you will be given a list of the Factions present in the game.
- You can make a new role before the game starts, That role can be from any faction that is in the game, including town and neutrals, Then you will become that role.
- That role will exist for this game only, you will show up as a New Role(1453) if investigated.
- The host has the right to force reroll you if they think the role is OP or Bad.
- You may reroll this even if you have no rerolls left.
